"     } ] Example 4: Term boostingPOST /indexes/hotel-samples-index/docs/search?api-version=2020-06-30 {     "search": "beach access",     "queryType": "full",     "select": "HotelName, Description, Tags",     "searchFields": "HotelName, Description, Tags", In fact, there's only one document that matches on "access", and because it's the onlymatch, it's placement is high (second position) even though the document is missing theterm "beach". JSONIn the "after" query, repeat the search, this time boosting results with the term "beach"over the term "access". A human readable version of the query issearch=Description:beach^2 access. Depending on your client, you might need toexpress ^2 as %5E2.After boosting the term "beach", the match on Old Carrabelle Hotel moves down tosixth place.
